title: Katie Boulter Wins a Tennis Trophy
summary: Katie Boulter, a tennis player from Britain, won a big tennis tournament called the Ostrava Open. She played against Tamara Korpatsch from Germany and won in three sets. This is her fourth trophy on the WTA Tour, which is a group of professional tennis events. After winning, she will move up in the world rankings to number 84, which is a big improvement. Boulter thanked her new coach, Michael Joyce, for helping her. She also mentioned that this win was special because it came during a tough year for her. Another British player, Emma Raducanu, lost her final match in a different tournament. Boulter's victory shows her hard work and determination in tennis.
